################################################################################
################################################################################
#                                                                              #
# Payment Stripe - maps to payments.stripe_transaction                         #
#                                                                              #
# Columns                                                                      #
# -------                                                                      #
#                                                                              #
# 1 = id                                                                       #
# 2 = user_id                                                                  #
# 3 = description                                                              #
# 4 = amount                                                                   #
# 5 = stripe_brand                                                             #
# 6 = stripe_country                                                           #
# 7 = stripe_exp_month                                                         #
# 8 = stripe_exp_year                                                          #
# 9 = stripe_last4                                                             #
# 10 = org_id                                                                  #
# 11 = other_member_id                                                         #
# 12 = days_ago (optional)                                                     #
# 13 = hour (optional)                                                         #
# 14 - minute (optional)                                                       #
#                                                                              #
# Notes: To be valid you must have one and only one of other_member_id         #
#        or org_id. There is no validation on this.                            #
#        If you want the transaction to be backdated (created_date in the      #
#         past), you can specify days_ago.                                     #
#        To make the transactions more realistic you can also specify  the     #
#        hour and minute in 24 hour format.                                    #
#                                                                              #
################################################################################
################################################################################
stripe1, bb, Online Popup Tournament, 45.00, visa, US, 4, 2024, 4242, fbc,,,,
